name: lchi
summary: Ichi is an easy to play but challenging one button puzzle game. Don't be deceived by the game simplistic look, it’s a braintwister for sure! Collect golden rings by rotating objects, using teleporters, breaking blocks and more.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 益智解密
  • 发行日期: 2014年6月12日
  • 售价: ￥21
